tool_description: Cameralyze is a no-code platform that has lots of AI components and algorithms.
name: Cameralyze
title: Cameralyze

api_list.name: Face Bluring Endpoints
api_list.description: Detects faces and blurs all of them.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cameralyze1.p.rapidapi.com/face/blurring"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cameralyze1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
